A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the cloest film I've seen that is as good as Empire Strike Back\, there are a few things I would have changed but they are minor compared to the beauty excellent story telling and just awesome new way they have moved Star Wars forward. This is the first time in ages I have been left not knowing what's coming next and having a sense of wonder and awe of the Force and myth behind Star Wars.
